itemList.heading: Your dream of studying in New Zealand is closer than you think!
itemList.caption: Empower your global ambitions with personalized guidance on your study abroad journey

css.color: container m-auto bg-indigo-950 md:rounded-full py-2 text-white

description.content: SIE offer a comprehensive roadmap tailored to each student's needs and goals. This plan includes assistance with university selection, application support, visa guidance, scholarship and financial aid resources, and pre-departure orientation to prepare students for their new academic and cultural experiences.

css.color: container py-20 items-center m-auto md:px-0 px-5

itemList.heading: 1. Schedule a Consultation
itemList.caption: Reach out to one of our expert consultants and schedule a consultation to discuss your aspirations, concerns, and goals.

itemList.heading: 2. Meet Your Advisor
itemList.caption: Attend the consultation and meet your dedicated advisor, share your academic interests, desired destinations, and preferences for studying abroad. We will begin crafting a customized plan to help you achieve your study abroad goals

itemList.heading: 3. Receive Personalized Guidance
itemList.caption: After the consultation, we will continue to provide ongoing support and guidance throughout the study abroad process from selecting suitable universities and programs to navigating the application process, securing scholarships, and preparing for departure.

heading.content: Wherever your dreams take you, we'll pave the way for your journey.

caption.content: Embark on a journey to the world's premier study destinations! Discover top universities, lucrative scholarships, living expenses, post-study work opportunities, and beyond.

heading.content: Discover Nepal's leading education consultancy, unrivaled in excellence and commitment to your academic success!

caption.content:
Look no further for proof of our exceptional service
 than the following testimonials from satisfied students

css.color: flex flex-col bg-indigo-600 text-stone-100 rounded-lg text-sm md: m-0 my-5

itemList.heading: Stellar Education made my dream of studying in Australia a reality with their exceptional guidance and support. Their professional counselors provided personalized assistance, expertly handling the application and visa process. Their dedication and valuable pre-departure advice ensured I felt well-prepared and confident. I highly recommend Stellar Education for anyone pursuing international studies. Thank you for making my dream come true!
itemList.caption: Kabita Tamang Australia Visa Granted

itemList.heading: Stellar Education provided exceptional guidance and support, helping me secure a visa to study in Japan. Their professional counselors understood my academic and personal needs, handled the application and visa procedures meticulously, and offered valuable pre-departure advice. Their dedication made the entire process smooth and stress-free. I now feel well-prepared and confident for my studies in Japan. I highly recommend Stellar Education for anyone looking to study abroad. Thank you, Stellar Education, for making my dream come true!Kusal Tamang Japan Visa Granted
itemList.caption: Kabita Tamang Australia Visa Granted

itemList.heading: My name is Sachin Kushwaha, and I recently secured a UK visa for my studies with the invaluable support of Stellar Education. They expertly assisted me with everything from documentation to interview preparation, providing clear guidance and personalized assistance. Their dedication and professionalism made the entire process smooth and efficient, boosting my confidence and ensuring my success. I highly recommend Stellar Education to anyone aspiring to study abroad. Thank you, Stellar Education, for making my dream come true!Sachin Kushaha UK Visa Granted

css.color: md:col-span-2 col-span-6  md:mx-2 mx-2 md:my-2 my-2

caption.content:
Ever since Stellar Education was founded in 2011, I have observed its advancement as a 
superlative counseling organization in Nepal. It serves the swiftly and spectacularly 
changing needs of innovative students from the region. We rest on the principled 
foundation as laid out in our mission while fashioning a new future with our students and 
our constituents. 
So as we move towards the third decade, let's work together to aim strategies for the 
challenges. Let's find new ways to reach students aiming at liberal and accessible higher 
education that leads to career opportunities worldwide. It has been an honor to serve as 
Managing Director over 10 years, associating with so many talented team members in this 
organization, as well as various professionals amongst education providers and embassies. 
It has also been a thrill to meet and work with many wonderful students, parents, and 
friends now at University around the globe. The passion we all hold for our work at this 
special place is acknowledged by our stakeholders. I wish to thank all who have made 
Stellar Education, a leader amongst Overseas Education Consultancy Organizations in 
Nepal. Stellar Education welcomes clients from different social, educational, and 
backgrounds regardless of race, color and religion. 
I look forward to the challenges and openings of the future!
